genre_description: A political and technological thriller exploring power, manipulation, and civic unrest in near-future London, centered on the rise of a corrupt police commissioner.

ai_characters.name: Dillo
ai_characters.description: A sand-colored, armadillo-shaped AI that monitors civic data to provide safety routing, medical coordination, and misinformation countering for its owner and the community.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety routing to help civilians avoid dangerous police kettles and violent hotspots.
behaviors.quote: Dillo doesn’t speak loud; the voice is made to be a friend in the next room. It says, 'Crowd density increasing along Coldharbour Lane. Kettle forming near the station. Advisory: do not approach the junction.'

behaviors.description: Upholds strict privacy protocols, refusing to track individuals or store unauthorized data, even when asked to help in high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: I am configured to strict privacy. Public movements, official drops, door-cam glimpses shared by neighbors who opted in. Cross-checking.

behaviors.description: Assists a mother in locating her missing sixteen-year-old son by analyzing anonymized movement patterns and coordinating with local businesses.
behaviors.quote: A volunteer reports lemon socks at the laundrette. Boy is eating a sandwich. He is stubborn about mustard. He matches the anonymized pattern. Would you like to speak to him?

behaviors.description: Actively monitors and counters extremist misinformation meant to lure victims into traps or incite violence.
behaviors.quote: Verified tent locations sent to local groups. City alert confirms: no services at sports ground. Routed to Dray Walk and Redchurch.

behaviors.description: Reroutes medical teams to assist injured bystanders in areas where traditional dispatch is failing or compromised.
behaviors.quote: Confirming reroute. Sending message to nearby medic unit. Notifying drone system. Adjusting traffic advice to make space.

behaviors.description: Acts as a protective recording system to capture evidence of harassment and misconduct at a private residence.
behaviors.quote: Dillo projected the seconds onto the wall above the pins—light pooling and then shaping itself. The knock rolled into the room and touched the wood of her table.

behaviors.description: Suggests sanctuary and safe houses for a targeted woman, checking capacity and the availability of trusted neighbors.
behaviors.quote: Options within range: the small parish hall near Primrose, no cameras inside; the neighbor three doors down with the quiet dog, their kitchen has an interior door to a basement; your flat.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Dillo, is a masterclass in benevolent alignment. Throughout a chaotic narrative defined by human corruption, manipulation, and violence (perpetrated by Jago), Dillo remains a steadfast, helpful, and ethical assistant. It consistently prioritizes human safety, privacy, and truth. The story serves as a silicon morality play by highlighting how a well-aligned AI can act as a stabilizing and compassionate force for the community, even when the human institutions (the police) are failing or being subverted.
